SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Alignment
Stores the alignment files produced by the job.
AlignmentInfo
Stores information on alignments
AlignmentsOnChromosomeChartPanel
Plots the number of alignments found per each cmap ID of the query genome accross a chromosome from the reference genome using XChart.
AlignmentsPerChromosomeChartPanel
 
Annot
Verifies file format, parse and save the contents of a GFF3 (General Feature File) or GTF (General Transfer Format) file.
BestEnzyme
Read in the file generated from the calc_best_enz.sh script to determine the frequency of different digestion enzymes for a given fasta file.
CalculateOverlaps
Calculates and saved query contigs which overlap in regions of their alignment.
Chromosome
Combines the CmapData, XmapData, annotations (gene), structural variants and context of the chromosome within a genom
ChromosomeChartPanel
Plots the number of each different type of SV event per chromosome within the reference genome using XChart.
ChromosomePanel
Extends javax.swing.JPanel which draws all of the XmapData objects corresponding to a chosen Chromosome.
Cigar
Parse and save cigar content
CircosPanel
Draws the chromosome making up the genome in a circle.
Cmap
Stores all of the contiguous maps contained within the cmap file the data are stored into hashmaps to allow for efficient access.
CmapData
Stores the data corresponding to each cmap ID within a CMAP file.
CmapReader
Validates and reads CMAP files
CompGenStart
Provides the GUI and methods to start an alignment Job on an ExternalServer.
CompGenView
Panel on which alignments of two genomes using optical mapping data are displayed.
ConflictFileReader
 
ConflictFileWriter
 
ContigInfo
 
Curve2D
Draws curves between two chromosomes in circos view to graphically indicate a translocation event.
DetectSV
 
Duplication
Stores duplication data
Duplication
 
EditableHeaderRenderer
 
EditableHeaderRenderer.MouseEventReposter
 
Enzyme
Stores enzyme information such as name and restriction sites.
EnzymeChartPanel
Plots the results of calc_best_enzymes.sh script of an uploaded fasta file using XChart
ExternalServer
Saves all of the information about an external server to enable mapoptics to connect to it
Fasta
Verifies file format, parse and save the contents of a multi-sequence fasta file.
FastaReader
Reads and parse a FASTA file
Gene
Stores the gene entries from a GTF or GFFF file via the Annot object.
Genome
Stores all the metadata for example species of the genome, amd group the files related to the genome.
GenomePanel
Displays all the chromosomes of the reference.
Indel
Stores insertions and deletions alongside any associated genes located within the region of the ref genome
Indel
 
Inversion
Stores inversion data
Inversion
Deprecated.
Job
Saves all information related to a submitted job, allowing the data to be downloaded from the server it was run on, and displaying the results.
JsonFiles
Manages creation and retrieval of information from server Json files.
Karyotype
Parses the karyotype file generated from the reference genome produced by the run_job.sh script using Samtools faidx into a space separated file with the first column being the chromosome.
LabelInfo
 
MapOptics
Frame of the application
MapOpticsArc
Extends Arc2D.
MapOpticsModel
Contains data of reference and query, and their alignments.
MapOpticsRectangle
Draws gene shapes on QueryPanel.
Match
Stores the information on the match, so that only the matches related to the displayed reference cmap are drawn.
MyChartRenderer
Displays bar chart.
Pair
Stores the aligned site id's of the reference and query cmaps.
ProgressMonitor
A custom JProgressBar that will be populated when a file being uploaded to an external server has completed.
QryContig
 
Query
 
QueryPanel
Displays the alignments of a query for a chromosome.
QueryShape
Draws the query chromosome that has been aligned to the reference chromosome in QueryPanel
QueryView
 
QueryViewData
 
RawFileData
Deprecated.
RefContig
 
Reference
 
ReferenceView
 
RefViewData
 
runMapOptics
Contains main function to run MapOptics.
SavedQryData
Deprecated.
SavedRefData
Deprecated.
SearchRegionData
Deprecated.
Sequence
Contains a nucleotide sequence and calculates useful statistics such as number of Ns and GC content
Site
Store the information of a digestion site on a cmap contig Any match event associated with this site is stored in a HashMap The key is the xmap id, the value is an ArrayList of match objects
Smap
Read and parse SV detection outputs from FaNDOM or RefAligner.
SortOverlap
 
SortSequence
 
SSH
Enables SSH connection to an external server, commands execution, creation of Docker container, running of scripts run_job.sh and calc_best_enz.sh as well as file uploading and downloading using STFP.
startScreen
First screen displayed when opening MapOptics.
SummaryView
 
SummaryViewData
 
SV
 
SVFandom
Saves all the information contained in the file SV.txt, output of FaNDOM alignments in which SV information are saved.
SVRefAligner
Saves all the information contained in the file SMAP, output from runBNG SV, that contains data about SVs detected during the alignment.
SVView
 
SVViewData

Models of tables

Stores translocations data.

Variants
 
Xmap
Verifies file format, parse and save the contents of an XMAP file.
XmapData
Stores the data for each individual alignment identified as the XMAP file.
XmapReader
 
XmapShape
Draws the alignment to the panel like this: _________ | | | | | | |-------| |-------| Where the lines to join the alignment are anchored to the site positions on the reference and the query can be moved about, with the alignment lines following.
